page.title: 12INFORMATION SOURCES
page.content: Most of the population gather information through television,radio,newspapers and libraries. Much of their spare time they spend watching the television anyway.Nearly every home has a telephone and via this they are able to gather information from anywhere in the world. Sometimes people need to get legal advice and this can be obtained through a free legal service housed in the nearest town. Each village has a library and this can usually give the information needed or give an address or phone number of someone else who could help.
